content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://practicestorageravi.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]


--Examine the data type for the column
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://practicestorageravi.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]'

--Find the maximum length of each column elements
SELECT
    MAX(LEN(LocationID)) as Len_LocationID,
    MAX(LEN(Borough)) as Len_Borough,
    MAX(LEN(Zone)) as Len_Zone,
    MAX(LEN(service_zone)) as Len_service_zone
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://practicestorageravi.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

--Change datatypes and give appropriate length to each columns.
--LocationID SMALLINT, Borough VARCHAR(15), Zone VARCHAR(50), service_zone VARCHAR(15)
--With ‘with clause’ provide explicit schema
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://practicestorageravi.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT, 
        Borough VARCHAR(15), 
        Zone VARCHAR(50), 
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    ) AS [result]


--Examine the data type for the column
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://practicestorageravi.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '','',
        ROWTERMINATOR = ''\n''
    ) WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT, 
        Borough VARCHAR(15), 
        Zone VARCHAR(50), 
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    ) AS [result]'

SELECT name, collation_name FROM sys.databases;
